T02TD1821E:261a-1: #// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku //
T02TD1821E:261b-0: bla ma dam @261b pa la btud de //
T02TD1821E:261b-1: de yi man ngag ji bzhin du //
T02TD1821E:261b-2: gtor ma'i chog bri bar bya //
T02TD1821E:261b-3: de la tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02TD1821E:261b-4: las bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02TD1821E:261b-5: bar du gcod pa rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gtor ma nar mar byed par 'dod pas srod kyi dus su sha lnga dang /
T02TD1821E:261b-6: bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu dang ldan pa'i gtor mas snod mdzes bkang ste /
T02TD1821E:261b-7: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed la /
T02TD1821E:261b-8: de nas stong pa nyid du mos par bya ste /
T02TD1821E:261b-9: de'i 'og tu h'um zhes brjod pas rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /
T02TD1821E:261b-12: phyi rol du me lce 'bar ba dang /
T02TD1821E:261b-13: rnam par 'khrigs par bsams shing nang du rin po chi'i khang ba nyams dga' ba bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1821E:261b-14: der bdag nyid skad cig tsam gyis lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms te rdo rje gsum dang /
T02TD1821E:261b-16: cod pan gyi lha dran pas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02TD1821E:261b-17: de nas rdo rje thal mo snying gar phye la gtor mar h'um a'a: aom bam bsams te /
T02TD1821E:261b-18: h'um chu ltar zhu bas kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD1821E:261b-19: a'a: zhugs dri phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02TD1821E:261b-20: aom zhub ro phun sum tshogs pa bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1821E:261b-21: de nas aom gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bkug ste gnyis su med par byas la 'bru gsum brjod pas brtan par bya'o //
T02TD1821E:261b-22: de nas bdag gi snying ga'i 'od zer gyis sems can thams cad dam yi dags kyi tshogs bkug ste /
T02TD1821E:261b-23: de dag gi snying ga dang spyi bor lha dang bla ma rigs kyi bdag po bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1821E:261b-24: de nas nang du bkug la thams cad kyi lce la h'um las rdo rje bskyed /
T02TD1821E:261b-25: aom gyis nor bu bskyed la /
T02TD1821E:261b-26: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am a'a dya nu ta nna tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1821E:261b-27: zhes brjod nas nor bu 'od zer gyis ljags kyi lce'u chung drang ba bzhin du so sor thim pas thams cad gnyis med kyi ye shes dang ldan par bsams te /
T02TD1821E:261b-28: yid 'byung ba'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyi kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1821E:261b-29: de nas mchod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang bcas la /
T02TD1821E:261b-30: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD1821E:261b-31: gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02TD1821E:261b-32: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD1821E:261b-33: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02TD1821E:261b-34: ngo bo gnyis med gnas med par //
T02TD1821E:261b-35: de ltar chos rnams shes nas kyang //
T02TD1821E:261b-36: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD1821E:261b-37: 'o na kyang sangs rgyas rigs su skye //
T02TD1821E:261b-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pas chos bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1821E:261b-55: ma ma sarbas ba ri war na sarba sa tva na nytsa /
T02TD1821E:262a-6: aa ta pu shpam ku ru /
T02TD1821E:262a-7: sarba pra yar ksha ku ru sva' t'a /
T02TD1821E:262a-9: shu pa tsi tta ka ra /
T02TD1821E:262a-12: khyed rnams kun la gsol ba ni //
T02TD1821E:262a-13: bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa dang //
T02TD1821E:262a-14: gnas kyi dbang phyug skye bor bcas //
T02TD1821E:262a-15: gdon nad la sogs zhib dang //
T02TD1821E:262a-16: tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang //
T02TD1821E:262a-17: bkra shes phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T02TD1821E:262a-19: ces 'dod pa'i don la sogs ba gdab ste /
T02TD1821E:262a-20: sems can thams cad sdig med cing //
T02TD1821E:262a-21: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig / sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub byed pa'i //
T02TD1821E:262a-22: lam de nyid du zhugs nas kyang //
T02TD1821E:262a-23: rnal 'byor brtul zhugs gnas la ni //
T02TD1821E:262a-24: da lta nyid du gnas par shog / ces pas dge pa yongs su bsngos la //
T02TD1821E:262a-25: aom a'a: h'um mu: zhes pas gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1821E:262a-26: bdag drin bla ma'i rgyud dang ni //
T02TD1821E:262a-27: blo dman rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02TD1821E:262a-28: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag bzhin //
T02TD1821E:262a-29: gtor ma'i chog bris pa yin //
T02TD1821E:262a-31: lam la gnas dang 'bras myang gis //
T02TD1821E:262a-32: tshogs rdzogs sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir //
T02TD1821E:262a-33: slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa yin //
